content:
The Australian Digital Health Agency is looking for a FHIR Developer/Analyst to join their Clinical Informatics team. In addition to working with an awesome team, you'll be contributing to the on-going collaboration and development of FHIR resources and profiles to support the My Health Record and other Australian digital health initiatives. And did I mention we have cookies?

Details including how to apply can be found at:

https://www.seek.com.au/job/35478538?_ga=2.164943480.637785406.1518410992-1970685486.1512344462

PM if you have any questions regarding the role. CLOSE DATE: 12pm AEST Friday 16th February, 2018.
